CustomField.description:
**IMPORTANT** If you change the length of this field you must also update the flow "VCC Review New Appointment Subflow". There is a formula named "formulaAppointmentCommentsMaxLength" which performs a function based on the length of this field. (JIRA CCCM-30614)
This field is a text field for any comments that need to be left on the appointment. It will be used in 'VCC New Appointment by Time" flow and 'VCC New Appointment by Provider' flow. Added as part of release 1.10.0.
CustomField.label: Appointment Comments
